# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_executable(ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut)


target_compile_options(ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_link_libraries(ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  contrib-restricted-nlohmann_json
  library-actors-http
  library-grpc-server
  grpc-server-actors
  ydb-core-base
  ydb-core-http_proxy
  core-testlib-default
  ydb-library-aclib
  library-persqueue-tests
  cpp-client-ydb_discovery
  cpp-client-ydb_types
  ydb-services-ydb
  library-cpp-resource
)

target_allocator(ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut
  cpp-malloc-tcmalloc
  libs-tcmalloc-no_percpu_cache
)

target_link_options(ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/http_proxy/ut/http_proxy_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/http_proxy/ut/inside_ydb_ut/inside_ydb_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/core/http_proxy/ut/inside_ydb_ut/a4a54fecc6c7df1d053bfeea0e394e63.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
  "INSIDE_YDB=1"
)

resources(ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/core/http_proxy/ut/inside_ydb_ut/a4a54fecc6c7df1d053bfeea0e394e63.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/http_proxy/ut/internal_counters.json
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/http_proxy/ut/proxy_counters.json

  internal_counters.json
  proxy_counters.json
)

vcs_info(ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-http_proxy-ut-inside_ydb_ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
